ygData.msgSnippet: I use the same unless I m in need of resists, when I switch to the BW cloak that is 8 AC, 20 FR and 10 MR. Great for Naggy. Forget which mob drops it though.
ygData.messageBody:
I use the same unless I'm in need of resists, when I switch to the BW cloak that is 8 AC, 20 FR and 10 MR. Great for Naggy. Forget which mob drops it though.

Tzeetch, Xegony Minstrel
